Modi saluted the armed forces and highlighted India's stance against nuclear threats, referencing actions taken after the Pahalgam attack.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-2025-speech-flag-hoisting-top-quotes-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/123315226.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-2025-speech-flag-hoisting-top-quotes-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/123315226.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 07:56:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="625902" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123315333,imgsize-625902.cms"/></item><item><title>79th Independence Day: PM Modi continues 'safa' tradition; opts for saffron turban</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to lead the 79th Independence Day celebrations, marking his 12th consecutive address from the Red Fort. Since 2014, PM Modi has showcased India's cultural diversity by wearing distinctive, colourful turbans. Each year, his turban reflects a different region or style, from Rajasthani bandhani to leheriya prints, paired with traditional kurta-churidar and jackets.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-pm-modi-continues-safa-tradition-opts-for-saffron-turban/articleshow/123315212.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-pm-modi-continues-safa-tradition-opts-for-saffron-turban/articleshow/123315212.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 07:31:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="716393" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123315318,imgsize-716393.cms"/></item><item><title>46 dead, 100 injured in J&K: Cloudburst wipes out pilgrims' camp in Kishtwar</title><description><![CDATA[A devastating cloudburst in Kishtwar, J&K, struck a pilgrimage pit stop at Chishoti, resulting in at least 46 fatalities, primarily among Shri Machail Mata Yatra pilgrims. Over 100 individuals sustained injuries, and numerous others remain missing. Rescue operations, involving the Army, police, and NDRF, have saved approximately 160 people.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/46-dead-100-odd-injured-many-missing-as-cloudburst-wipes-out-pilgrims-camp-in-jks-kishtwar/articleshow/123310810.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/46-dead-100-odd-injured-many-missing-as-cloudburst-wipes-out-pilgrims-camp-in-jks-kishtwar/articleshow/123310810.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Aug 2025 23:36:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANJAY KHAJURIA AND NASEER GANAI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1689338" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123310818,imgsize-1689338.cms"/></item><item><title>85+ Happy Independence Day messages, greetings, wishes & quotes</title><description><![CDATA[India gears up to celebrate its 79th Independence Day in 2025, commemorating freedom achieved on August 15, 1947. Citizens are encouraged to share patriotic wishes, messages, and quotes on social media, reflecting on sacrifices made and reaffirming commitment to unity and progress.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-independence-day-2025-wishes-messages-quotes-images-facebook-whatsapp-status-greetings-card-gifs-pictures-15-august-wishes/articleshow/123304468.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-independence-day-2025-wishes-messages-quotes-images-facebook-whatsapp-status-greetings-card-gifs-pictures-15-august-wishes/articleshow/123304468.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 05:24:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44640" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123304502,imgsize-44640.cms"/></item><item><title>Jamie Dimon on US-China tech race: Calls reliance on Beijing ‘embarrassing’</title><description><![CDATA[The Nvidia H20 chip sales to China are under scrutiny. Sehwag heeded the advice, returned to form, and played a vital role in India's 2011 World Cup victory. He also shared his thoughts on his son Aryaveer's cricket career, emphasizing the importance of handling pressure.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-dont-make-decision-when-youre-emotional-virender-sehwag-reveals-sachin-tendulkar-stopped-him-from-odi-retirement-in-2007-08/articleshow/123308684.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-dont-make-decision-when-youre-emotional-virender-sehwag-reveals-sachin-tendulkar-stopped-him-from-odi-retirement-in-2007-08/articleshow/123308684.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Aug 2025 21:56:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21138" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123308896,imgsize-21138.cms"/></item><item><title>'25% chance …': Trump teases outcome of talks with Putin; hints at bigger showdown</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump envisions a three-way summit with Vladimir Putin and Volodymyr Zelenskyy to finalize a Ukraine peace deal, following his Alaska meeting with Putin on August 15. Trump acknowledged a 25% chance of the Alaska summit being unsuccessful, emphasizing its role in setting the stage for future negotiations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/trilateral-meet-to-divvy-things-up-trump-on-russia-ukraine-deal-post-alaska-summit-claims-25-chance-talks-with-putin-may-fail/articleshow/123307442.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/trilateral-meet-to-divvy-things-up-trump-on-russia-ukraine-deal-post-alaska-summit-claims-25-chance-talks-with-putin-may-fail/articleshow/123307442.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Aug 2025 20:12:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32790" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123307674,imgsize-32790.cms"/></item><item><title>Vece Paes borrowed Olympic medal from Dhyan Chand’s son after losing his; but final wish went unmet</title><description><![CDATA[Dr. Vece Paes, the Olympic bronze medalist in hockey, passed away, leaving behind a legacy of sportsmanship and dedication. Despite battling Parkinson's in his later years, he sought to recreate his lost Olympic medal, even borrowing one from a former teammate.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/hockey/untold-story-vece-paes-borrowed-olympic-medal-from-dhyan-chands-son-after-losing-his-but-his-final-wish-went-unmet/articleshow/123302639.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/hockey/untold-story-vece-paes-borrowed-olympic-medal-from-dhyan-chands-son-after-losing-his-but-his-final-wish-went-unmet/articleshow/123302639.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Aug 2025 16:48:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="75828" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123303198,imgsize-75828.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[India’s rubber industry is seeking government intervention to counter the impact of steep US tariffs, which threaten a ₹5,000–₹5,200 crore trade surplus. AIRIA President Sashi Singh told CNBC-TV18 the sector has requested export incentives, duty drawbacks, and more FTAs, while also focusing on diversifying exports to Europe and boosting domestic demand.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The group’s crown jewel, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), has been the biggest casualty, losing nearly $70 billion in market value since September last year.
